removal_reasons.has_employment_history: Correlated with has_firm_data (r=1.000), keeping shorter/more intuitive name
removal_reasons.is_tenure_missing: Correlated with has_firm_data (r=-1.000), keeping shorter/more intuitive name
removal_reasons.firm_departures_12mo: Correlated with firm_net_change_12mo (r=-0.972). Keeping firm_net_change_12mo as it captures the delta signal (derived feature).
removal_reasons.industry_tenure_months: Correlated with experience_years (r=0.963), keeping shorter/more intuitive name
removal_reasons.tenure_bucket_x_mobility: Correlated with mobility_3yr (r=0.937), keeping shorter/more intuitive name
removal_reasons.firm_rep_count_12mo_ago: Highly correlated with firm_rep_count_at_contact (r=0.837). Keeping _at_contact as it's more directly relevant to contact timing and has higher IV.
removal_reasons.firm_arrivals_12mo: Correlated with firm_rep_count_at_contact (r=0.820). Keeping firm_rep_count_at_contact due to high IV (0.7991).
removal_reasons.experience_years: High VIF (999.00) and correlated with other features (max r=0.963)
removal_reasons.mobility_3yr: High VIF (8.09) and correlated with other features (max r=0.937)
removal_reasons.tenure_months: Removed to prevent overfitting - continuous values enable fine-grained memorization. Using only tenure_bucket for coarser, more generalizable patterns.
